forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. Southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 82. North northwest wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
